description: Sliding into our Mua ‘Ili feels a lot like sliding into a gentle wave at sunset. The buttery soft leather moves with your step while shearling gently hugs your foot with warmth. The best part? We gave this handsome scuff slipper the same support and grip you’d get from a pair of sneakers. Kick back at home or explore the neighborhood—Mua ‘Ili is the laidback companion you need.
name: Olukai Mua Ili - Mens
